    Reference

    All functions

    add_arrow()

    Add arrrows to an scplot

    add_dataline() set_dataline()

    Set and add datalines of an scplot

    add_grid()

    Add grid to an scplot

    add_labels()

    Add value labels to an scplot

    add_legend()

    Add a legend to an scplot

    add_marks()

    Add marks to an scplot

    add_ridge()

    Add a ridge to an scplot

    add_statline()

    Add a statline to an scplot

    add_text()

    Add test to an scplot

    add_theme()

    Add a theme of to an scplot

    add_title() add_caption()

    Add title and caption to an scplot

    as_ggplot()

    Creates a ggplot2 object from an scplot object

    .inherit_scplot()

    Dummy function to inherit global descriptions of parameters

    element_point()

    Point element In conjunction with ggplot an object to represent point attributes.

    print(<scplot>)

    print.scplot

    scplot-package

    Single-Case Data Plots

    scplot()

    Plot single-case data

    scplot_theme()

    Create a new theme for scplot

    set_background() set_panel()

    Set plot and panel background of an scplot

    set_base_text()

    Set base text characteristics of an scplot

    set_casenames()

    Set casenames of an scplot

    set_phasenames()

    Set phasenames of an scplot

    set_separator()

    Set separator line in an scplot

    set_theme_element()

    Set a theme element

    set_xaxis() set_yaxis()

    Set axis parameters of an scplot

    set_xlabel() set_ylabel()

    Set label for axis
